ThingDef.label: researching spot
ThingDef.description: A place for research simple concepts. Researching here is slow because of the lack of tools.

ThingDef.label: Stonecutting Spot
ThingDef.description: A place for bashing stones to each other. Production here is slow because of the lack of tools.

ThingDef.label: butcher's block
ThingDef.description: A wooden stump for butchering dead creatures into pieces of raw meat.

ThingDef.label: cooking table
ThingDef.description: A wood-fueled oven with an attached countertop for preparing meals.

ThingDef.label: oven
ThingDef.description: A cooking table with a stone oven designed for baking meals.

ThingDef.label: grill
ThingDef.description: A wood fueled grill used for cooking meals with an open fire.

ThingDef.label: Stew Pot
ThingDef.description: A large metal cauldron that can cook delicious soups.

ThingDef.label: millstone
ThingDef.description: A small round stone for grinding raw plants.

ThingDef.label: research bench
ThingDef.description: A simple bench with writing implements and simple measurement devices. Researchers work here to discover new things. Requires paper to research.

ThingDef.label: Drying Rack
ThingDef.description: A wooden rack to dry goods under the sun for preservation and long time use.

ThingDef.label: Post
ThingDef.description: A support post to let viny plants grow effectively

ThingDef.label: Presser
ThingDef.description: A wooden contraption to press whey from curds, which makes milk into delicious cheese.

ThingDef.label: Smoker
ThingDef.description: Smoke generated by the burnt wood stacked at the bottom of the smoker encompasses the meat, providing indirect heat and a rich smoke flavor. This also adds a protective layer and allows the smoked meat to last longer.

ThingDef.label: Workbench
ThingDef.description: A work table equipped with tools for crafting and designing items.

ThingDef.label: tanning rack
ThingDef.description: A standing rack for treating raw hides to become useful leathers.

ThingDef.label: spinning wheel
ThingDef.description: A rolling contraption that processes raw cotton into fabrics.

ThingDef.label: tailor's bench
ThingDef.description: A wooden worktable for sewing and stitching fabrics to produce wearable clothing.

ThingDef.label: Furnace
ThingDef.description: A large stone furnace used to smelt raw ores and refine resources.

ThingDef.label: Anvil
ThingDef.description: A large metalworking tool with a flattened top surface to strike objects on such as weapons and armor.

ThingDef.label: mine shaft
ThingDef.description: A sturdy platform equipped with a primitive elevator built on top of a vertical tunnel. Can be used for mining resources and chunks.

ThingDef.label: gardening box
ThingDef.description: A box filled with dirt to grow plants.
